overview: In Dirty Talk 4, sexy sluts verbally seduce director/superstar stud Manuel Ferrara - and you! When these gorgeous babes' mouths aren't stuffed full of massive, uncircumcised meat, they're spewing a steady stream of filthy vocabulary, expressing their nastiest erotic cravings to Manuel - but also directly to viewers, courtesy of POV-style shooting.
tagline: They'll Tell You What You Want To Hear
title: Dirty Talk 4
